body:
Thanks to everyone upstairs, my problem has been located, because the worker node access mysql account permissions are insufficient, has been resolved, thank you.

---
感谢楼上各位，我这边的问题已经定位到了，是因为worker节点访问mysql的账号权限不足导致的，已经解决了，谢谢。

Location: Hangzhou, China

Scenario: Big Data Scheduling

场景：大数据调度

good idea!

Could you give us more detail requirement，such as “how to transfer data ？ key/value or other method”

or Could you submit a pull request to solve this question？

very good idea !
#404  this issue has similar idea, please Please supplementary on that issue， thx！
Thank you for your advice! At present, it needs to be uploaded first,you can only select when you create the process again!If more users also raise this question, we will consider adding them later!
good idea,  could you submit a pull request to implement this ?

There is no such implementation in distributed systems. Separation of duties is required for a large system. As you say, the maintenance cost will be higher once the amount of tasks is up.

---
分布式系统还没有这种实现的，职责分离是一个大型系统所需要的，如您所说，比较担心的是这种方式一旦任务量上来的话，维护成本会更高

Once the quantity is up, you can start several more nodes. Because of the life, only one master survives and the other is a worker. If the master hangs, other workers participate in the campaign.

---
一但量上来，可以多启动几个节点，因为众生平等，只有一个master 存活其它都是worker ，如果master挂，其它worker 参与竞选。
Currently,administrator can authorize resource files to other users
Which version of escheduler  can authorize resource files to other users
You need to log in as an administrator and then authorize

then how to debug or Dev for windows platform Developer @lidongdai
please use ubuntu or mac for now ,  we will support windows later

Navigation: Monitoring Center / master / worker monitoring
Problem: The port description is not accurate, the value is the pid of the boot process
Recommendation: Change "port" to "pid"

---
导航:监控中心/master/worker监控
问题:端口描述不准确,值是启动进程的pid
建议:将"端口"修改为"pid"

After creating the tenant escheduler, use the tenant escheduler to create the user test. Using the test to execute the shell script has the above error.
[escheduler@node1 /opt/escheduler/logs]$ vim /opt/escheduler/logs/1/5/6.log
[INFO] 2019-06-20 10:12:41.479 cn.escheduler.server.worker.log.TaskLogger:[178] - [taskAppId=TASK_1_5_6] -> Sorry, user escheduler is not allowed to execute '/bin/sh /tmp/escheduler/exec/process/1/1/5/6/1_5_6.command' as escheduler on node1.

CentOS 7.

Found the problem,
Sudo -u escheduler sh /tmp/escheduler/exec/process/1/2/6/9/2_6_9.command
Reporting permission issues
Sudo sudo -u escheduler sh /tmp/escheduler/exec/process/1/2/6/9/2_6_9.command can be executed correctly.

---
发现问题了，
sudo -u escheduler sh /tmp/escheduler/exec/process/1/2/6/9/2_6_9.command
会报权限问题
sudo sudo -u escheduler sh /tmp/escheduler/exec/process/1/2/6/9/2_6_9.command 则可以正确执行。

Problem: Kill -9 work node, work on zk is already empty. Master log print work failover end . But front-end fault work has no status
Suggestion: It is recommended to add the work status flag or directly remove the work that has failed.

---
问题：kill -9 work 节点，zk上work 已经是空的。master 日志 打印 work failover end .  但是前端故障work 没有状态 标识 节点下线
建议：建议添加work 状态标记或者直接去掉已经故障的work

1,vi /etc/sudoers

For example, the deployment user is an escheduler account.
Esceduler ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: NOPASSWD: ALL

And need to comment out the Default requiretty line
#Default requiretty

#Default requiretty Is this comment?

2, is this installed through install, or manually installed by yourself? Look at your command permissions, by default we generate read and execute permissions

---
1，vi /etc/sudoers

例如部署用户是escheduler账号
escheduler ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: NOPASSWD: ALL

并且需要注释掉 Default requiretty 一行
#Default requiretty

#Default requiretty 这注释了吗？

2，这是通过install安装的，还是自己手动安装的？看你command权限，默认我们生成的都是有读和执行权限的

Install installed,
The company machine does not allow the addition of all user rights.
There is no ssh secret for using the root user.

---
install安装的,
公司机器不允许加免密所有用户权限。
使用root 用户又没有ssh免密。

we handle it by  "${processInstancePriority}_${processInstanceId}_${taskInstancePriority}_${taskId}_host1,host2,...", add task can execute on hosts at the end
when execute method "taskQueueZkImpl.poll"，worker server will hold its ip to match， if can match ，the task will be taken

Which tenant is it? Scheduling is only submitted on behalf of the tenant, which is equivalent to executing "sudo - tenant sh xxx.command"

---
租户是哪个？ 调度只是代租户提交，相当于执行“sudo - 租户 sh  xxx.command”

The tenant name must be present on the server and does not require sudo privileges.

Tenant zuhu002, the corresponding users exist on the server

---
租户zuhu002，对应的用户在服务器上都存在啊

Which user are you deploying EasyScheduler, execute it under the deployment user:
Sudo -u zuhu002 sh /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command

Looking at the report will refuse permission error?

---
你是哪个用户部署EasyScheduler的，在该部署用户下执行一下：
sudo -u zuhu002 sh /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command  

看下会报权限拒绝错误么？

Yes, execute under the deployment user or report an error Permission denied.
As follows `sudo -u zuhu002 sh /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command
Sh: /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command: Permission denied`

---
是的，在部署用户下执行还是报错 Permission denied.
如下` sudo -u zuhu002 sh /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command
sh: /data/yananlin/soft/escheduler/exec/process/2/4/3/3/4_3_3.command: Permission denied`

Go in and look at your command to see if the environment variable source, no permissions

---
进去看一下你的command，看是不是环境变量source的，没有权限

Source a .escheduler_env.sh , this file permissions changed to all groups have execute permissions, or reported permission errors.

---
source 了一个这个 .escheduler_env.sh ，这个文件权限改成所有组都有执行权限，还是报权限错误呃。

You WeChat @me, WeChat chat

---

It is recommended to explain and prompt to use OPENJDK1.8 in the deployment documentation.

---
建议在部署文档里说明并提示使用 OPENJDK1.8

We use Oracle official jdk1.8 internally, and open jdk 1.8 in docker. At present, we have not encountered such a problem. We will locate it according to your environment.

---
我们内部使用的是Oracle官方jdk1.8，docker中使用的是open jdk 1.8，目前没有遇到这样问题，根据你的环境我们定位一下

This is not a bug. After the master or worker is dropped, the zk temporary node will still exist (this is the internal mechanism of zk), and if there is a prompt message. To solve the problem in two ways, either manually delete the zk temporary node information, and then start it, or wait until the zk temporary node is deleted before starting. We can't delete the temporary node at startup because the running node may be deleted by mistake.

---
这不是一个bug，master或者worker掉后，zk临时节点还是会存在（这是zk内部机制），这时如果启动会有提示信息。两种方式解决，要么先手动删除zk临时节点信息，然后启动，或者等到zk临时节点删除之后再启动。我们不能在启动的时候删除临时节点，因为可能会误删除正在运行的节点
